description: Hours after Philippe's resignation, an inquiry is launched into the government's handling of Covid-19.
title: Edouard Philippe: France's former PM faces probe into Covid-19 response
title_page: Edouard Philippe: France's former PM faces probe into Covid-19 response - BBC News
maintext: "For three years he's been by my side... we've carried out important, historic reform often in very difficult circumstances. We have a relationship of trust that's in a way unique in terms of the French Republic," the president said of Mr Philippe in a newspaper interview.
